posts.author: Mick Dagger
posts.content:
If you can reach dex 18 with buffs or items: Then your AC with a chain shirt or scale mail will be only 1 down compared with full plate. What you gain is a reduction in armor check penalty from -8 with full plate to -2 with chain shirt or scale mail, equal to a +6 to stealth skills. You also get a bonus to stealth from the extra dex you have added.

If you only change the "robe" of your armor, you don't need any crafting skills at all, and it's free.

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Change the feats in the following way:
Level Guide
1 Fighter1, Dodge, Mobility, Exotic weapon Proficiency
2 Fighter2, Knockdown
3 Fighter3, Weapon Focus: Scythe
4 Fighter4, WS: Scythe, Str17
5 Fighter5
6 Fighter6, Stealthy, Improved Knockdown
7 Fighter7
8 Fighter8, Improved Critical: Scythe, Str18
9 Fighter9, Skill Focus: Hide
10 Fighter10, Blind-Fighting
11 Fighter11
12 Fighter12, Skill Focus: Move silently, Expertise, Str19
13 Fighter13, (crossclass Hide/Move Silently 8 )
14 Assassin1
15 Assassin2, Toughness, (Ghostly Visage)
...
At level 14, without buffs whatsoever, you'll have 22(24) ranks in both Move Silently & Hide.
If we take the worst case scenario & say you'll stay in full plate that is modified to (16) Stealth which isn't exactly bad for that level.
At level twenty comes Invisibility & at level twenty-one here comes HiPS as well, following with Improved Invisibility at level twenty-three.
Until level fourteen you can "mimic" the Assassin's play-style with potions of Invicibility, suddenly appearing from nowhere & then executing an Alpha-strike with IKD.
